## MODEL\_DATA\_TABLE\_VALIDATION\_ERROR\_MESSAGES variable

A token for providing global validation error messages for all forms

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MODEL_DATA_TABLE_VALIDATION_ERROR_MESSAGES: InjectionToken<DataTableValidationErrorMap>
```
